author: Ali Asghar
content: I really appreciate the new "About Me" timed status feature. However, many users (including myself) would also like the option to set a permanent or lifetime "About Me" that does not expire after a few hours or days. Could you please consider adding a "Lifetime" option alongside the existing durations (1 hour, 8 hours, 1 week)? This would allow users to keep their About Me visible permanently if they prefer, while still giving flexibility to those who want temporary statuses.

author: David Todd
content: Spotify is the best music streaming app out there. The playlists they build for you are spookily intuitive and the quality of the streaming is superb. I like the download facility too, it's just the outstanding app in its field. Since Spotify introduced lossless I have upgraded my speakers to enable me to listen in this high definition and whilst I'm not sure I can hear much difference what I can definitely say is that it sounds amazing. I listen at home through a pair of Sonos era 100 speakers.
